definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The restaurant receives hundreds of customers every day.
sentences.chinese: 这家饭店每天接待数以百计的顾客。

sentences.english: Dinner-time, and still no Hundreds of people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭时间到了，“数以百计的人”仍然没有出现。

sentences.english: Curious sightseers rolled up in their hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的好奇的观光客都涌到那儿。

sentences.english: Eight years of stepping through the Gate, hundreds of trips, all leading to this attempt to reach Earth.
sentences.chinese: 穿越星门八年来，数以百计的探险，只为回到地球。

sentences.english: In Minsk, hundreds of Jews were marched from the city.
sentences.chinese: 在明斯克，数以百计的犹太人被从城里赶出来。

sentences.english: Hundreds of those convicts remain at large.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的逃犯仍逍遥法外。

sentences.english: Cholera and Acute Water Diarrhea (AWD) are taking the lives of hundreds of children.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱和急性水腹泻已经夺去数以百计儿童生命。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people are waiting there.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的人正守在那儿。

sentences.english: Hundreds of photos were scattered higgledy -piggledy across the floor.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的照片杂乱散布在地板上。

sentences.english: Hundreds of Al-Shabaab fighters paraded through the streets of Mogadishu.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的青年党战士在摩加迪沙的各个街道行进。

sentences.english: There are (hundreds of) things in the school Lost and Found Office.
sentences.chinese: 学校的失物招领处有数以百计的物品。

sentences.english: Select from hundreds of fund-raising and the grand prize a blank template.
sentences.chinese: 选择从数以百计的集资和奖励模板空白超大。

sentences.english: Hundreds of troops have been dispatched to the region to assist in the effort.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的军队已经赶赴灾区，帮助救援工作。

sentences.english: Hundreds of statues were beheaded and a number of bas-reliefs removed.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的雕像被砍头，大批的浅浮雕被运走。

sentences.english: Hundreds of sheep were corralled for sale.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的羊被关在栏中待售。

sentences.english: It is estimated that there are hundreds of this kind building in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江现存的传统祠堂戏场建筑就数以百计。

definition: hundreds/a large number/lit. by the hundreds and thousands
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
more than ten/a dozen or more
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
